entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is described as having changed with colourful and glittering window displays hidden behind Ministry of Magic posters.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as pasting over the window displays in Diagon Alley with their posters.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is described as sneering from the front of an apothecary in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: florean fortescue’s ice-cream parlour
entities.description: Florean Fortescue's Ice-Cream Parlour is mentioned as having its windows boarded up.

entities.name: flourish and blotts
entities.description: Flourish and Blotts is mentioned as having a stall erected outside it.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as being on the loose with black-and-white photographs of them displayed in Diagon Alley.

relationships.description: The Ministry of Magic posters are pasted over the window displays in Diagon Alley.
Bellatrix Lestrange is sneering from the front of an apothecary in Diagon Alley.
Florean Fortescue's Ice-Cream Parlour has its windows boarded up due to the presence of Death Eaters.
Flourish and Blotts has a stall erected outside it due to the presence of Death Eaters.
